text: We've now reached the end of our course together.
As always, I've enjoyed it immensely, and I hope you have too.
Now would be a good time to begin using the accompanying booklet.
This can be used in a number of ways.
It can be used to practice and reinforce what you've learnt,
and it can also be used as an introduction to the written language.
In addition to this, the accompanying review CD will provide you with a quick and easy way
to revise what was taught during the course.
I look forward very much to teaching you again.
This is the end of CD10.
